comments:
Description:
Chart in attached report doesn't display correctly

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview attached report in Web viewer/html/pdf.
2. Deploy birt and preview attched report in Web viewer/html/pdf

Expected result:
Four charts display

Actual result:
In Web Viewer, preview is ok.
The second chart disppeared when preview in pdf.
While deploy birt, the second chart also disappeared in html and returned below errors:
Chart (id = 29):
- $NO-RB$ null

null ( 1 time(s) )
